meanings.definition: Isologs: compounds that have the same structure and function
meanings.sent1: Scientists study isologs to understand how similar compounds work.
meanings.sent2: The isologs in this experiment showed identical properties.
meanings.sent3: The isologs decided to have a competition to see who could function better.
meanings.sent4: The isologs of the chemical world, like twins, share both structure and function.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, the isologs danced together, showcasing their identical moves.

meanings.definition: Isologs: having the same or similar characteristics as something else
meanings.sent1: The two isologs plants looked almost identical in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was isologs to the one her friend wore to the party.
meanings.sent3: The isologs cupcakes tasted so similar that no one could tell them apart.
meanings.sent4: His isologs behavior to his brother's surprised everyone at the family gathering.
meanings.sent5: The isologs clouds in the sky seemed to mirror each other perfectly.
